net.shadowfacts.mirror.stream

Class FieldStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shadowfacts.mirror.stream.FieldStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.stream.BaseStream<MirrorField,java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorField>>, java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorField>

    public class FieldStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorField>
    A wrapper for a stream of MirrorFields that provides helper operations
    See Also:
    Mirror.ofAllUnwrappedFields(Stream), Mirror.ofAllUnwrappedFields(Collection), Mirror.ofAllUnwrappedFields(Field...), Mirror.ofAllUnwrappedMethods(net.shadowfacts.mirror.scanner.Scanner, Object)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.stream.Stream

        java.util.stream.Stream.Builder<T>
